tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ContentTrends (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_title VARCHAR(255),
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  audience_age_group VARCHAR(50),
  audience_gender VARCHAR(50),
  audience_location VARCHAR(100),
  view_count INT,
  engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE content_trends (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    publish_date DATE,
    views INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT
);

CREATE TABLE audience_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    interests TEXT,
    favorite_content_id INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Trends (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(255),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    publishing_date DATE,
    views INT,
    likes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Audience_Preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    interests VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    views INT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT,
    share_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE ContentPosts (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title VARCHAR(255),
    post_content TEXT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    likes_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE AudienceFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ContentAnalytics (
    analytics_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID,
    views_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT,
    click_through_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE audience_preferences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  likes INT,
  dislikes INT
);

CREATE TABLE data_mining (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data_source VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  mining_algorithm VARCHAR(50),
  processing_time INT,
  results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE query_databases (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  query_id INT,
  query_text TEXT,
  execution_time FLOAT,
  success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE content_strategy (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  recommendations TEXT,
  implementation_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
